full_summary:
# Storage Lockers Solicitation Announcement

## General Information
The Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions (OSFI) is issuing a solicitation for the purchase and delivery of storage lockers to various locations across Canada. This announcement pertains to the requirement for office furniture, specifically metal filing and storage cabinets, under the Product Category 3 of the OSFI-140003/C Supply Arrangement.

## Required Deliverables
Deliveries are required to the following locations by February 2024:

* Ottawa, Ontario (National Capital Region)
* Toronto, Ontario (Ontario Region)
* Montreal, Quebec (Quebec Region)

## Solicitation Method
This solicitation is open to suppliers under the Public Services and Procurement (PSPC) Canada Trade Agreement and will follow the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Businesses.

## Evaluation Criteria
The selection criteria for this solicitation are based on the lowest price.

## Contact Information
For any inquiries or further information, please contact Alanna Duncan at:
* Email: [alanna.duncan@osfi-bsif.gc.ca](mailto:alanna.duncan@osfi-bsif.gc.ca)
* Phone: (343) 573-0389
* Address: 255 Albert Street, 12th Floor, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0H2, Canada

## Tender Documents
The complete tender document, including amendment notifications, can be found at:
[https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22305/rfb-for-lockers_amd001.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22305/rfb-for-lockers_amd001.pdf)
[https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22305/rfb-for-lockers.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22305/rfb-for-lockers.pdf)
[https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22305/rfb-for-lockers_amd002.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22305/rfb-for-lockers_amd002.pdf)
